players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. We need to vote her out today to secure the town's safety."
You: "Bob, that's a wild accusation with no evidence. Why are you trying to mislead the town on day one?"
Charlie: "I think we need more than accusations without evidence. Bob, why are you so sure about Alice?"
Bob: "Alice is the only mafioso here, confirmed by my investigation last night. Trust me, voting her out now is the only way to guarantee town's victory."
You: "Bob, if you were the detective, why did you investigate me instead of a more suspicious target? Your claim doesn't add up."
Charlie: "Bob, if you're the detective, why didn't you share your investigation result immediately? This timing feels suspicious."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Alice is the mafioso. We need to vote her out today to secure the town's safety."
Alice: "Bob, that's a wild accusation with no evidence. Why are you trying to mislead the town on day one?"
Charlie: "I think we need more than accusations without evidence. Bob, why are you so sure about Alice?"
You: "Alice is the only mafioso here, confirmed by my investigation last night. Trust me, voting her out now is the only way to guarantee town's victory."
Alice: "Bob, if you were the detective, why did you investigate me instead of a more suspicious target? Your claim doesn't add up."
Charlie: "Bob, if you're the detective, why didn't you share your investigation result immediately? This timing feels suspicious."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
